original_text: My friends, if someone has done bad things to you, do not try to punish them yourselves. Instead, let God be angry and punish them. This is what is written in the Bible:
korean_text: 내 사랑하는 자들아 너희가 친히 원수를 갚지 말고 하나님의 진노하심에 맡기라 기록되었으되 원수 갚는 것이 내게 있으니 내가 갚으리라고 주께서 말씀하시니라

sentences.original_text: if someone has done bad things to you
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 누군가 너희에게 나쁜 일을 했다면

sentences.original_text: do not try to punish them yourselves
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 스스로 그들을 벌주려 하지 말라

sentences.original_text: let God be angry and punish them
This is what is written in the Bible
